doc:
Mary Loos https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Loos 0 Mary Loos (May 6, 1910 – October 11, 2004) was an American actress, screenwriter and novelist. She was occasionally credited under her full name, Mary Anita Loos. Born in San Diego, she was the daughter of Dr. Clifford Loos, co-founder of the Ross-Loos Medical Clinic and the Ross-Loos Medical Group, the first Health maintenance organization (HMO) in the United States. She was the niece of screenwriter Anita Loos. She was both co-creator and one of the writers for Yancy Derringer (1958-1959), an American Western TV series. Mary_Loos ( May_6_,_1910 – October_11_,_2004 ) was an_American_actress , screenwriter_and_novelist . She was_occasionally_credited under her_full_name , Mary_Anita_Loos . Born in San_Diego , she was the_daughter of Dr._Clifford_Loos , co-founder of the_Ross-Loos_Medical_Clinic and the_Ross-Loos_Medical_Group , the_first_Health_maintenance_organization ( HMO_) in the_United_States . She was the_niece of screenwriter_Anita_Loos . She was both co-creator and one of the_writers for Yancy_Derringer_(_1958-1959_) , an_American_Western_TV_series .
